approve.description: Approves the specified address to spend a specified amount of tokens.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another using the allowance mechanism.

mint.description: Mints a specified amount of tokens and assigns them to the specified address.

burn.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from the caller's account.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens from the caller's account to the specified address.

push.description: Pushes tokens from the caller's account to the specified address.

move.description: Moves tokens from one address to another.

stop.description: Stops all functionality of the contract.

setName.description: Sets the name of the token.

setOwner.description: Sets the owner of the contract.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of tokens held by the specified address.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining amount of tokens that the specified address can spend on behalf of the owner.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used to represent the token.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

stopped.description: Returns whether the contract is stopped.

authority.description: Returns the address of the authority.

owner.description: Returns the address of the owner.

LogSetAuthority.description: Emitted when the authority address is set.

LogSetOwner.description: Emitted when the owner address is set.

LogNote.description: Emitted when a note is logged.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another.

Approval.description: Emitted when an owner approves a spender.
